mapper.select: SELECT medical_record_no FROM tt.regist_msg WHERE id_number=#{id_number} limit 0,1
SELECT max(medical_record_no) FROM tt.regist_msg
SELECT MAX(regist_id) FROM tt.regist_msg
SELECT user_id inde,rel_name label from tt.user where dep_no=#{depName} and reg_lev=#{regType}
SELECT reg_level inde,reg_name label,reg_fee fee,reg_limit limi from tt.regist_lev
SELECT depart_id inde,depart_name label FROM tt.department
SELECT DISTINCT(medical_record_no) inde FROM tt.regist_msg
SELECT t1.const_id inde,t1.const_name label FROM tt.const_item t1 WHERE t1.const_cata_id= (SELECT t.`﻿const_cata_id` FROM tt.const_cata t WHERE t.const_cata_name='收费方式')
SELECT name name,gender gender,birthday birthday,id_number idNumber,address FROM tt.regist_msg WHERE medical_record_no=#{medicalNum} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tt.regist_msg WHERE doc_id=#{docNum} and diagnose_state=1
SELECT MAX(invoice_ID) FROM tt.invoice

SELECT regist_id registid,medical_record_no medicalrecordid,name,id_number idnumber,date,apm, (SELECT de.depart_name FROM tt.department de WHERE de.depart_id=regist.dep_no) dep, (CASE diagnose_state WHEN 1 THEN "已挂号" WHEN 3 THEN "已退号" WHEN 2 THEN "已看诊" WHEN 4 THEN "已诊毕" ELSE "其他" end) diagnosestate FROM tt.regist_msg regist WHERE medical_record_no=#{medicalrecordid}
mapper.update: UPDATE tt.regist_msg SET diagnose_state=3 WHERE regist_id=#{registid}
mapper.select: SELECT cit.const_id inde,cit.const_name label FROM tt.const_item cit WHERE cit.const_cata_id = (SELECT cca.`﻿const_cata_id` FROM tt.const_cata cca WHERE cca.const_cata_name="收费方式")
SELECT pre.prescription_id FROM tt.prescription pre WHERE pre.regist_id=#{settlement.registid} AND pre.medical_record_id=#{settlement.medicalrecordid}
SELECT (SELECT drug.fee FROM tt.drug drug WHERE drug.drug_id =pd.drug_id) drugfee, pd.num drugnum FROM tt.prescription_detail pd WHERE pd.prescription_id=#{preid}
mapper.update: UPDATE tt.prescription pre SET pre.status=3 WHERE pre.prescription_id=#{preid}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT d.fee FROM tt.drug d WHERE d.drug_id=pd.drug_id) profee, pd.num quantity FROM tt.prescription_detail pd WHERE pd.prescription_id=#{prescriptionid}
SELECT u.user_id FROM tt.user u WHERE u.user_name=#{docid}

SELECT pd.prescription_id prescriptionid, t.regist_id registid, (SELECT u.dep_no FROM tt.user u WHERE u.user_id=t.doc_id) depid, t.doc_id docid, (SELECT d.drug_name FROM tt.drug d WHERE d.drug_id=pd.drug_id ) drugname, pd.prescription_detail_id pdi, t.medical_record_id medicalrecordid, t.medical_record_name proname, (SELECT d.fee FROM tt.drug d WHERE d.drug_id=pd.drug_id ) fee, pd.num, t.create_time createtime, (CASE t.status WHEN 1 THEN "已开立" WHEN 2 THEN "已作废" WHEN 3 THEN "暂存" ELSE "其他" END) status FROM tt.prescription_detail pd , (SELECT * FROM tt.prescription p WHERE p.medical_record_id=#{medicalrecordid}) t WHERE pd.prescription_id =t.prescription_id AND pd.status=1 # 从未缴费的里面选

SELECT pd.prescription_id prescriptionid, t.regist_id registid, (SELECT u.dep_no FROM tt.user u WHERE u.user_id=t.doc_id) depid, t.doc_id docid, (SELECT d.drug_name FROM tt.drug d WHERE d.drug_id=pd.drug_id ) drugname, pd.prescription_detail_id pdi, t.medical_record_id medicalrecordid, t.medical_record_name proname, (SELECT d.fee FROM tt.drug d WHERE d.drug_id=pd.drug_id ) fee, pd.num, t.create_time createtime, (CASE pd.status WHEN 1 THEN "已开立" WHEN 2 THEN "已缴费" WHEN 3 THEN "已退费" WHEN 4 THEN "已发药" ELSE "其他" END) status FROM tt.prescription_detail pd , (SELECT * FROM tt.prescription p WHERE p.medical_record_id=#{medicalrecordid}) t WHERE pd.prescription_id =t.prescription_id AND pd.status=2
mapper.update: UPDATE tt.prescription_detail SET status=2 WHERE prescription_detail_id=#{pdi}
